barzel “iron”

𓃀 𓇋 𓈞 𓊌 | ⲃⲉⲛⲓⲡⲉ 𒈲 "iron" <> baňa 𓃀 𓇋 𓈞 𓊌 | metal (bronze ?, iron ?) |

𒌓𒉣𒇻 par-zil-lu | iron | 𐤁𐤓𐤆𐤋 brzl /barzel/ “iron” פַּרְזְלָא ܦܪܙܠܐ parzəlā 𐎁𐎗 𐎏 𐎍 brḏl ⇔ bronzeˡ
𒌓𒉣𒇻 par-zil-lu | iron | {fer} ferro < *ferzoᵐ > firon ƒ 𐤁𐤓𐤆𐤋 barzel ⇔ brutzel burn 𒌓𒌓 bretzel ;)
𒌓𒉣𒇻 par-zil-lu | iron | {fer}želězo желе́зен ⋍ χαλκός > khalkós Proto-Sino-Tibetan *qhleks “(cast) iron” +++
𒌓𒉣𒇻 par-zil-lu | iron | {𓇳}dzèlzs geležìs σιδήρεος sιdḗreos (ι⋍l!) ⇔ solder 𓇳 shields ⇔ ḫapalki, “iron”
𒌓𒉣𒇻 par-zil-lu | iron | ⇔ •prīsarną > īsarną eisern iron *h₁ésh₂r̥ 𒄭𒄭 𓇳 sarną ⇔ shields Schalk χαλκό
𒌓𒉣𒇻 par-zil-lu | iron | ⇔ parzelle “a small piece or part” unlikely

𒆬𒌓 •KÙBAR <> KUCAR :

𐀏-𐀒 ka-ko καυχός kaukhós (@caucasus?) < 𐀏𐀏𐀩𐀀 ka-ka-re-a ≈ 𐀏-𐀒 kaˡko χαλκός khalkós chalco- in chalcolithic cauldron! > حَلْقُوس ḥalqūs 𐀏-𐀒 kaʳko •karko حَرْقُوس ḥarqūs harkous harqous @ French <> carcass "urn" 𐃫 𓏋 𓏌 𐀏-𐀐 kaˡke χάλκεα (neuter nominative/accusative/vocative plural of χάλκεος) 𐀏-𐀐-𐀊-𐀠 ka-ke-ja-pi 'of bronze' instrumental plural 'a pair of bronze (wheels)' ⇔ κὐκλα χάλκεα 𐀏-𐀐-𐀸 ka-ke-we coppersmiths 𐀏-𐀒-𐀆-𐀲 ka-ko-de-ta bind with copper, 'bronze-bound wheels' ⇔ χαλκόδετος

Metals are part of a syllable carousel, revolving around roots for 'shine':

𓋞 Nobel 𒀭𒀝 Nabu
𓋞 Kyros 𒆬𒄀 KU₃.GI
𓐍𓋴𓋞 χρύσεος gold chryso christ:shine
𓌈𓋞𓈓 ἄργυρος silver a-kyros => argent (money)
𓌈𓋞𓈓 𐀀𐀓𐀫 a-ku-ro argentum अर्जुन árjuna արծաթ arcatʿ ἀργός
𓌈 ἄργ Erz 𒍏 URUD

𒆬𒄀 KU₃.GI 𓐍𓋴 Chryso gold vs ἄργυρος árgyros vs
𒆬𒌓 KU₃.UD چاندی cá̃dí (Baluchi) cándí نگرہ արծաթ arcatʿ argat < argent ⇔ güne 銀 ぎん gin / shirogane

agugPI [OBJECT] 𒀀𒈖 𒉿 a-gug2-PI / AB.GAR5.PE / A.LU3.WE "a metal item"

𒄘 gun₂ 𒄘𒌦 gu₂un √gene yield; load; √coin: rent, tax, tribute; a unit of weight #biltu
𒄘 gùⁿ ganz 𒄘𒀭𒂠 gu₂an-še₃ 'total' 𒄘𒂗 gu.en 𒄘𒋛𒀀 gùⁿsi.a
𒄘 gùˡ whole all 𓎟 = 𒆗 kall 𒌦 kalam 𒅗𒆷𒈠 ka-la-maⁿ 𒆕 kali "Keil" vs Kerbe
